test_username module¶

These tests are to make sure the username functions correctly

test_username.test_username_cannot_be_copied(logoff)[source]¶

This test creates a new user, tries to create another user with the same name, then creates third unique user Validatin is done on all three steps. This verifies that the username must be unique. Note: Need a step added to check that usernames cannot be changed to a copy

Parameters:logoff – Makes sure the session is in a logged off state before the test starts.
Returns:
